InReac: ^Ninja: That castle landed quite far away
^Berserk: Yeah! We have been walking for ages, I'm tired
^Mage: It's only been a few hours, and look! We are almost there
^Samurai: Silence, look what's in front of the castle
^Ninja: Another camp full of monsters. They have no intention in letting us inside the castle
^Mage: I agree... I don't like it but we will have to fight them. We won't reach the castle's gate otherwise
^Berserk: Then we shouldn't waste more time
